title: Bryan Ferry: A Classic Crooner Informed By The Art-Rock Movement
teaser: For more than 40 years, former Roxy Music frontman Bryan Ferry has been making some of the most suave, luxurious music. NPR's Arun Rath speaks with Ferry about his 17th solo album, Avonmore.
